column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Probably my favorite ramen that I've tried so far
column2: broth was excellent- flavorful and thick but not cloying. I surprised to find the restaurant full at midnight on a Friday night
column3: but we were sat right away at a communal table (probably the only detractor in the experience
column4: it being so loud and everyone else being so close). We also got the agedashi tofu (bland and not worth it) and the takoyaki (excellent
column5: they were soft and the octopus was tender). Service was quick and efficient. Overall it was a great experience and Ill be back for more ramen.
